title: Armor
content:
dge Wanderer Armour

Chain Of Liberation

Sprint: Once per turn, the wearer can reduce the duration of their Momentum by 1 turn to Sprint.

AC bonus from Dexterity limited to +2

Dark Justiciar Mail

Half Plate Armour +1

Robust Chain Shirt

Piercing Counter: When the wearer has 50% Hit Points or less and is damaged by a melee attack, they deal 1d4 Piercing damage to the attacker.

AC bonus from Dexterity limited to +2

Superior Material: You take 1 less Slashing damage.

Disadvantage on Stealth
